DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy work different way stop growth tumor cell , either kill cell stop divide . Giving one drug ( combination chemotherapy ) may kill tumor cell . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial compare two different combination chemotherapy regimens see well work treat patient stage II stage III non-seminomatous germ cell tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Treating Patients With Stage II Stage III Germ Cell Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare progression-free survival rate patient poor prognosis stage II III non-seminomatous germ cell tumor unfavorable decrease tumor marker treatment 1 course bleomycin , etoposide , cisplatin follow subsequent treatment 3 additional course bleomycin , etoposide , cisplatin OR dose-dense sequential combination chemotherapy . - Compare overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients receive 1 course bleomycin , etoposide , cisplatin ( BEP ) . Patients favorable decrease tumor marker 1 course BEP receive 3 additional course BEP . Patients unfavorable decrease tumor marker 1 course BEP randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive 3 additional course BEP . - Arm II : Patients receive dose-dense sequential combination chemotherapy comprise cisplatin , etoposide , bleomycin , paclitaxel , oxaliplatin , ifosfamide . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 260 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis nonseminomatous germ cell tumor ( NSGCT ) evidence 1 follow criterion : Histologically confirm NSGCT Clinical evidence disease AND high serum human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) alphafetoprotein ( AFP ) level Clinical stage IIIII disease ( disseminated disease ) Testicular , retroperitoneal , mediastinal primary site Poor prognosis disease , meet 1 follow criterion : Mediastinal primary site Nonpulmonary visceral metastasis One follow lab value : HCG > 50,000 UI/L AFP > 10,000 ng/mL Lactate dehydrogenase > 10 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age Over 16 Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Absolute granulocyte count ≥ 1,500/mm^3 Platelet count ≥ 100,000/mm^3 Hepatic Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time ULN Renal Creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min Other No prior malignancy except basal cell skin cancer No HIV positivity PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy No prior chemotherapy Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify
